comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let binary variable x_{j, m} be equal to 1 if job j is processed on machine m, and 0 otherwise.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": "1. Each job must be processed on exactly one machine: 
 \sum_{m \in Machines} x_{j, m} = 1,  orall j \in Jobs 
 2. Each machine can process at most one job at a time: 
 \sum_{j \in Jobs} x_{j, m} \leq 1,  orall m \in Machines 
 3. Processing order constraint: 
 \sum_{m \in Machines} m * x_{j, m} \leq \sum_{m \in Machines} m * x_{j+1, m},  orall j \in Jobs \setminus \{last\} 
 4. Makespan constraint: 
 Makespan \geq \sum_{j \in Jobs} \sum_{m \in Machines} m * x_{j, m} * ProcessTime_{j, m}",
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize the total makespan: 
 Minimize Makespan"
}
